name: Background Gradient Color
author: Tawhidur Rahman Dear

sections.description:
This Plugin changes Background Gradient Color while visitor scrolls website

  • It works in almost all browsers: Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome, Opera!
  • Only Plugin activation is enough to bring change for whole website. No need to edit settings or do something else
  • The Plugin takes very low space in hosting
  • This works in Desktop, Laptop, Tab, Smartphone

Live Preview

https://store.devilhunter.net/wordpress-plugin/background-gradient-color

The Plugin works on “Background”. So, in the live preview, see both left and right side of the website for background. Now Scroll! Although the code of this live example link works on that specific webpage, not in whole website; as it is specially designed to do so. But this Plugin will work on whole WordPress website.

Who can use?

Anyone! You can use it any WordPress website. But this Plugin is helpful especially for :

  • the websites that you want to build as eye-catching
  • entertainment website, kids website, fun website etc
  • long-article based blog website, and if you are interested to make it comfortable by visitors

Looking for something special? Buy Pro

  • This free version has only 1 style, but Pro version has 10 styles
  • Price is Affordable
  • Buy from trusted marketplace CodeCanyon
  • Easy Installation! After activation of the Plugin, Simply go to Settings > Daisy page to select your favorite style
  • No coding knowledge or expertise required! You will not have to use any short-code
  • Video Preview available below

Thank you

Tawhidur Rahman Dear

  • Dear IT Solution : IT Consultancy, Web and App Development, AdSense, SEO, Graphic Design, Password Recovery and Security, Online Marketing, Corporate Services
  • Dear Store : WordPress Plugin, JavaScript, CSS Code, Blogger Theme, Desktop Software for Windows
  • Dear Apps Corner : More than 75 Android Apps to make your life beautiful
sections.installation:
Download this free WordPress.org Plugin, and

Step 1. Open your WordPress Admin Dashboard, click “Add New” in Plugins section
Step 2. Click on “Upload Plugin”
Step 3. Select the downloaded package, now click on “Install Now”
Step 4. Click on “Activate Plugin” to activate the Plugin

Done! You have successfully installed the WordPress Plugin. Now see the output in website live in browser.
